section1.title: § 1. General provisions
section1.p1: The controller of personal data processed in connection with the use of the Flovers website and the Flovers mobile application is Marcin Janowski Copy Paste IT Solutions Kraków, with its registered address at ul. płk. Francesco Nullo 30/115, 31-543 Kraków, Poland, e-mail address: info@flovers.app, hereinafter referred to as the “Controller”.
section1.p2: The Controller processes personal data in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 (GDPR).
section1.p3: This Privacy Policy applies to the Flovers website, the Flovers mobile application (Android and, in the future, iOS), and the backend infrastructure associated with their operation.

section2.title: § 2. Scope and purposes of personal data processing
section2.intro: The Controller processes personal data for the following purposes:
list: creation and management of a user account within the application
sending system messages, including account verification and password reset e-mails
handling messages sent via the contact form
ensuring proper operation of the application and the website
providing reminders, tasks, and notifications related to plant care
ensuring system security and maintaining technical logs
section2.legalBasis: The legal basis for data processing is Article 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract), Article 6(1)(c) GDPR (legal obligation), and Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest of the Controller).

section3.title: § 3. Types of personal data processed
section3.intro: Depending on how the application or website is used, the Controller may process the following data:
list: technical device data (device type, operating system, application version)
device orientation data (e.g. to optimise plant light exposure)
data entered by the user relating to plants, measurements, and IoT sensor readings
section3.note: Photos taken by the user are generally processed locally on the user’s device unless the user chooses to use features that require server-side processing.

section4.title: § 4. User accounts and security
section4.p1: Users of the Flovers application create individual accounts secured with a password.
section4.p2: Passwords are stored in encrypted (hashed) form.
section4.p3: A user account requires verification of the provided e-mail address.
section4.p4: The user may change their password at any time or use the password reset procedure.

section5.title: § 5. Notifications and communication
section5.p1: The Controller sends only transactional messages, in particular those related to login, account verification, and password reset.
section5.p2: The application may use push notifications (e.g. via Firebase) to remind users about plant care tasks.
section5.p3: The Controller reserves the right to introduce a newsletter in the future; marketing communications will be sent only after obtaining the user’s separate consent.

section6.title: § 6. Cookies and similar technologies
section6.p1: The Flovers website may use cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the website.
section6.p2: Cookies are used solely for technical and functional purposes.
section6.p3: The website does not use third-party analytics or marketing tools.

section7.title: § 7. Data recipients and place of processing
section7.p1: Personal data are processed on servers located within the European Union.
section7.p2: The server infrastructure is provided by Hetzner Online GmbH.
section7.p3: The Controller may use Firebase services for the purpose of handling push notifications.
section7.p4: Personal data are not transferred to third countries outside the European Union.

section8.title: § 8. Data retention period
section8.p1: Personal data are stored for the duration of the user account.
section8.p2: After account deletion, data are permanently deleted or anonymised, unless retention is required by applicable law.

section9.title: § 9. Rights of data subjects
section9.intro: Each data subject has the right to:
section9.p2: To exercise the above rights, please contact the Controller at: info@flovers.app.
section9.p3: Data subjects also have the right to lodge a complaint with the President of the Polish Personal Data Protection Office (UODO) or another competent supervisory authority.

section10.title: § 10. Final provisions
section10.p1: The Controller applies appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect personal data.
section10.p2: The Controller reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy.
section10.p3: The current version of the Privacy Policy is always available on the Flovers website and within the mobile application.
